title: Chicken Parmesan
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, oregano, and garlic powder.
Dip each chicken breast in beaten eggs, then coat with a mixture of breadcrumbs and Parmesan cheese.
In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat and fry the chicken until golden brown on both sides.
Transfer the fried chicken to a baking dish. Top each breast with marinara sauce and shredded mozzarella cheese.
Bake in the preheated oven for about 20 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and golden.
Garnish with fresh basil if desired and serve hot.

title: Bacon BBQ Cheeseburger
instructions: Preheat your grill or skillet over medium-high heat.
Season the ground beef with salt and pepper and shape it into 4 patties.
Cook the bacon in a skillet until crispy, then set aside on paper towels.
In the same skillet or on the grill, cook the burger patties for about 4-5 minutes on one side.
Flip the patties and place a slice of cheddar cheese on each one. Cook for an additional 3-4 minutes, or until the cheese melts.
Toast the hamburger buns on the grill for about 1 minute.
Assemble the burgers: spread BBQ sauce on the bottom bun, add the burger patty with melted cheese, top with bacon, onion slices, lettuce, tomato, and pickles if desired.
Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: In a large bowl, mix yogurt, lemon juice, cumin, coriander, garam masala, turmeric, chili powder, garlic, and ginger.
Add chicken pieces to the marinade, cover, and refrigerate for at least 1 hour, or overnight for better flavor.
Heat oil or ghee in a large pan over medium heat. Add onions and cook until golden brown.
Add the marinated chicken and cook until browned on all sides, about 5-7 minutes.
Stir in the pureed tomatoes, cover, and let simmer for 15-20 minutes, until the chicken is fully cooked.
Add the cream and stir well. Simmer for an additional 5 minutes until the sauce thickens.
Season with salt to taste, garnish with fresh cilantro, and serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Cookies and Cream Oreo Sundae
instructions: Place two scoops of vanilla ice cream into each serving dish or bowl.
Drizzle hot fudge sauce over the ice cream.
Sprinkle crushed Oreo cookies over the top.
Add a generous amount of whipped cream on top of the Oreo layer.
Drizzle chocolate syrup over the whipped cream.
Garnish with chopped Oreos, chocolate chips, and a maraschino cherry if desired.
Serve immediately and enjoy!
